column2: This person is destined to rule from birth and is gifted with extraordinary talents that will help to reach this destiny.
column4: Diese Person ist von Geburt an dazu bestimmt, zu herrschen und ist dabei mit außergewöhnlichen Gaben beschenkt, die ihr helfen werden, dieses Schicksal zu erreichen.

column2: This wealthy landowner has distinguished his or herself in many courts, making a name for him or herself as a fount of wit and logic.
column4: Dieser wohlhabende Grundbesitzer hat sich an vielen Höfen ausgezeichnet und sich als Quell von Verstand und Logik einen Namen gemacht.

column2: While this person may or may not have a complete education, they are of average ability when it comes to court duties.
column4: Während diese Person eine vollständige Ausbildung haben kann oder auch nicht, ist sie bei der Ausübung ihrer Aufgaben von durchschnittlicher Befähigung.

column2: Of little importance, evil, or just plain uneducated in the way of ruling, this person is known to be of poor ability in the way of politics.
column4: Von geringer Bedeutung, böse oder einfach nur ungebildet in Fragen der Herrschaft ist diese Person bekannt dafür, dass sie eine geringe Begabung in Sachen Politik hat.

column2: This person has nearly fully honed their ingenuity with mechanical systems.
column4: Diese Person hat ihren Einfallsreichtum mit mechanischen Systemen fast perfektioniert.

column2: By spending a little more time creating new inventions and innovating with already existing ones, this person has taken some time to hone their mechanical genius.
column4: Indem sie etwas mehr Zeit damit verbringt, neue Erfindungen zu entwickeln und bestehende verbessert, hat diese Person ein wenig Zeit darauf verwendet, ihr mechanisches Genie zu perfektionieren.

column2: This person is relatively new to the art of engineering. Either inventing or innovating, they seem to keep to themselves when engaged with their projects.
column4: Diese Person ist relativ neu in der Ingenieurskunst. Entweder mit dem Erfinden oder Verbessern beschäftigt, scheint sie sich im Umgang mit ihren Projekten völlig zurückzuziehen.

column3: Non colonisé
Non colonisé

column2: There are no rules out here in the wilderness
column3: Sur ces terres, il n'y a aucune forme de gouvernement ou d’état. Elles sont ouvertes à la colonisation.
column4: In dieser Provinz ist keinerlei Form von Regierung etabliert, sie kann kolonisiert werden.
column5: In dieser Provinz ist keinerlei Form von Regierung etabliert, sie kann kolonisiert werden.

column3: Seigneur du Feu

column2: The Lord of Fire is an incredibly strong ruler of fire elementals, and one of the four Elemental Lords. His plane is the Firelands, the realm of fire and ash, lying deep beneath the earth and the ocean within the realm of the elements.
column4: Der Feuerlord ist ein unglaublich mächtiger Herrscher der Feuerelementare und einer der vier Elementarlords. Seine Ebene ist das Feuerland, das Reich von Feuer und Asche, das tief unter der Erde und dem Ozean im Reich der Elemente liegt.

column2: Knight of the Brotherhood of the Horse
column3: Chevalier de la Confrérie du Cheval

column2: The Brotherhood of the Horse is an ancient order of the knights from the kingdom of Stormwind. It has existed since the man migrated from Strom, now known as the Arathi Highlands. Members of the brotherhood are the strongest soldiers in the azerothian military: among their ranks are the greatest and most famous knights and warriors of Stormwind, who are always ready to sacrifice their lives for the good of their homeland.
column4: Die Bruderschaft des Pferdes ist ein alter Orden der Ritter des Königreichs Stormwind. Es existiert, seit die Menschen aus Strom, dem heutigen Arathi-Hochland, ausgewandert ist. Mitglieder der Bruderschaft sind die stärksten Soldaten des azerothischen Militärs: Zu ihren Reihen gehören die größten und berühmtesten Ritter und Krieger von Stormwind, die immer bereit sind, ihr Leben für das Wohl ihrer Heimat zu opfern.

column3: Membre du Conseil des Ombres

column2: The Shadow Council is an organisation of warlocks from mortal peoples, which stands in the service of the demons of the Burning Legion. The Shadow Council was created by Gul'dan while he was still on Draenor, when the united clans of orcs began a war against the Draenei. The initial objectives of the council was to ensure stability in the war, which the Horde began against the Draenei, through the political manipulation of clans and the spread of sorcerous magic. With the invasion of the Horde into Azeroth, the Shadow Council has significantly expanded its sphere of influence not only inside the Horde, but also beyond its borders, by launching its networks to all corners of the known world.
column4: Der Schattenrat ist eine Organisation von Hexenmeistern sterblicher Völker, die im Dienste der Dämonen der brennenden Legion steht. Der Schattenrat wurde von Gul'dan gegründet, als er noch auf Draenor war, als die vereinigten Orkclans einen Krieg gegen die Draenei begannen. Die ersten Ziele des Rates waren die Gewährleistung der Stabilität im Krieg, den die Horde gegen die Draenei begann, durch die politische Manipulation von Clans und die Verbreitung von Hexerei. Mit der Invasion der Horde in Azeroth hat der Schattenrat seinen Einflussbereich nicht nur innerhalb der Horde, sondern auch über ihre Grenzen hinaus deutlich erweitert, indem er seine Netzwerke in alle Ecken der bekannten Welt ausbreitete.

column3: Membre de la Main d'argent

column2: This character is a member of the paladin order of the Silver Hand.
column4: Dieser Charakter ist Mitglied des Paladinordens der Silberhand.

column3: Seigneur des Cryptes
Reine araignée
Sorcier des Moissons
Sorcière des Moissons
Duel sur le champ de bataille
IA

column2: AI can attack non-player characters in battle. §RCPU heavy!§!
column4: Die KI kann Nicht-Spieler-Charaktere auf dem Schlachtfeld angreifen. §RCPU-intensiv!§!

column3: Joueurs

column2: Only player can attack characters in battle.
column3: Seul le joueur peut attaquer des personnages dans la bataille.
column4: Nur Spieler können andere Charaktere auf dem Schlachtfeld angreifen.

column2: You hear faint whispers in the back of your mind, they tell you terrible things and show you equally horrible scenarios.
column4: Ihr hört leise Stimmen in Eurem Hinterkopf, sie erzählen Euch schreckliche Dinge und zeigen Euch ebenso schreckliche Bilder.

column2: Is this really happening to me?!
column3: M'est-ce vraiment arrivé ?!

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: The more visions I see, the worse they become. I see the Old Gods, each of them growing like a mountain of flesh, decorated with countless fanged maws and bottomless eyes.
column4: Je mehr Visionen ich bekomme, desto schrecklicher wird es. Ich sehe die alten Götter, sie ragen wie Berge aus Fleisch auf, geschmückt mit Hunderten von fauchenden Mündern und schwarzen Augen.
Ich halte das nicht länger aus!

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: The nightmares overpower you. Hundreds of disgusting limbs and tentacles close in around you.
column4: Die Albträume überwältigen Euch. Hunderte von abstoßenden Gliedern und Tentakeln umschließen Euch.

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: Their maddening whispers are getting worse and worse. Your sick mind can no longer resist. In desperation you grab a sharp object and begin carving their voices out of your own skull!
column4: Ihr wahnsinniges Geflüster wird immer schlimmer. Euer kranker Verstand kann nicht mehr widerstehen. Der Verzweiflung nahe greift Ihr ein scharfes Objekt und tut das einzig Richtige und versucht, ihre Stimmen aus Eurem Kopf zu schneiden.

column3: Aah !

column2: Their whispers are slowly disappearing, is the grip they once held over my mind weakening?
column4: Das Flüstern in meinem Kopf verblasst, hört schließlich ganz auf. Haben die alten Götter ihre Kontrolle über meinen Geist aufgegeben?

column2: The dark, twisted voices infest your mind, compelling you to commit unthinkable acts as they whisper their terrible omens.
column4: Die dunklen, verdrehten Stimmen suchen Euren Geist heim und zwingen Euch zu unvorstellbaren Taten, während sie ihre schrecklichen Omen flüstern.

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: Your masters demand your blood in a dark ritual.
column4: Eure Meister verlangen Euer Blut für ein dunkles Ritual.

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: The Old Gods demand a blood ritual! You are commanded to perform the sacrificial ritual in their name.
column4: Die alten Götter fordern ein Blutritual! Von Euch wird verlangt, das Opferritual in ihrem Namen durchzuführen.

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column2: Your masters demand the sacrifice of one of your kin.
column4: Eure Meister fordern, dass Ihr einen Eurer Verwandten opfert.

column2: For the glory of the Old Gods!
column3: Pour la gloire des Dieux très anciens !
column4: Für den Ruhm der alten Götter!

column3: C'est de la folie !
Faveur de N'Zoth

column2: A servant of the Old Gods has agreed to speak favourably of you to N'Zoth, but only if you pay a tithe to His cult.
column4: Ein Diener der alten Götter hat zugestimmt, gegenüber N'Zoth wohlwollend von Euch zu sprechen, aber nur, wenn Ihr seinem Kult spendet.

column3: Pour mon Maître !
C'est une mauvaise idée.

column2: Recently a messenger from [Root.GetName] has reported gnoll forces raiding nearby settlements.
column4: Kürzlich berichtete ein Bote aus der Provinz [Root.GetName] von Gnolltruppen, die die umliegenden Siedlungen überfallen.

column2: Recently a messenger from [From.GetName] has reported gnoll forces raiding nearby settlements.
column4: Kürzlich berichtete ein Bote [From.GetName]s von Gnolltruppen, die die umliegenden Siedlungen überfallen.

column3: Ils doivent être défaits !

column2: A local scouting party reports that gnolls from the province of [Root.GetName] have become more aggressive recently and are gathering troops for war.
column4: Die Gnolle aus der Provinz [Root.GetName] werden immer aggressiver. Sie sammeln ihre Truppen und bereiten sich auf den Krieg vor.

column2: A local scouting party reports that gnolls from the province of [From.GetName] have become more aggressive recently and are gathering troops for war.
column4: Die Gnolle aus der Provinz [From.GetName] werden immer aggressiver. Sie sammeln ihre Truppen und bereiten sich auf den Krieg vor.

column3: Nous devons les anéantir !

column2: The Mak'gora has been announced, but you may choose the rules for this fight.
column4: Ein Mak'Gora wurde verkündet und es obliegt Euch, die Regeln zu wählen, nach denen gekämpft wird.

column2: We will not fight to the death.
column4: Wir werden nicht bis zum Tod kämpfen.

column2: The lethal outcome of a duel is impossible\n
column4: Dies wird kein Duell bis zum Tode.\n

column2: The winner may kill the loser at the end of the duel\n
column4: Dem Sieger ist es gestattet, den Verlierer am Ende des Duells zu töten.\n

column2: [From.GetSheHeCap] is unfit for ruling! I challenge [From.GetHerHim]!
column4: [From.GetSheHeCap] ist ungeeignet zu herrschen! Ich werde [From.Getihnsie] herausfordern!

column2:
[Root.GetFirstName], I challenge you to a non-lethal Mak'gora. I have no desire to kill you, but we should settle this dispute.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
[Root.GetFirstName], ich fordere Euch zum nicht-tödlichen Mak'Gora. Ich will Euch nicht töten, aber wir müssen unsere Fehde beenden.

Gezeichnet,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
[Root.GetFirstName], I challenge you to a traditional Mak'gora. I want to fight you to the death!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
[Root.GetFirstName], ich fordere Euch zu einem traditionellen Mak'Gora. Wir müssen unsere Fehde beenden, hier und jetzt.

Gezeichnet,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
[Root.GetFirstName], you're a terrible leader! You are not worthy to rule! I challenge you!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
[Root.GetFirstName], Ihr seid eines Anführer nicht würdig! Ihr seid der Herrschaft nicht wert! Ich fordere Euch zum Mak'Gora!

Gezeichnet,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: I don't care about traditions, I will not put my life at risk!
column4: Rituale und Traditionen interessieren mich nicht, ich werde mein Leben nicht aufs Spiel setzen!

column2:
[Root.GetFirstName], I accept your challenge. Lok'tar Ogar!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
[Root.GetFirstName], ich nehme Eure Herausforderung an. Lok'tar Ogar!

Gezeichnet,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
[Root.GetFirstName], I refuse to fight against you.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
[Root.GetFirstName], ich weigere mich, gegen Euch zu kämpfen.

Gezeichnet,
[From.GetTitledName]
Was für eine Schande! [From.GetSheHeCap] hat keine Ehre!

column2: Participants in the Mak'gora, or any of their vassals, should not fight each other outside of the ceremony.
column4: Duellanten im Mak'Gora, sowie ihre Vasallen, sollten nicht miteinander Krieg führen.

column2: [target_duel_defender_01.GetDynName] is in the heath of the battle, a few steps away from you. This is a great chance for an attack.
column4: [target_duel_defender_01.GetDynName] befindet sich mitten in der Schlacht, nur wenige Schritte von Euch entfernt. Das ist die Gelegenheit zum Angriff.

column2: And let the best man win!
Here you can see how you can attack your enemy.
column4: Hier könnt Ihr sehen, auf welche Weisen Ihr Euren Gegner attackieren könnt.

column2: Here you can see how you can improve your defence for one or more turns.
column4: Hier könnt Ihr sehen, auf welche Weisen Ihr Euch gegen Euren Gegner verteidigen könnt.

column2: Here you can see actions that can increase or decrease your stats. You'll also see special abilities.
column4: Hier findet Ihr weitere Aktionen, mit denen Ihr Eure Chancen im Kampf verbessern könnt. Außerdem findet Ihr hier Spezialfertigkeiten.

column2: Here you can see how you can leave the battlefield without facing your enemy.
column4: Hier findet Ihr Möglichkeiten, wie Ihr Euch aus dem Kampf zurückziehen könnt.

column2: On this turn you can physically damage your enemy.
column4: In diesem Zug fügt Ihr Eurem Gegner physischen Schaden zu.
Benutzt einen Zauberspruch gegen Euren Feind.

column2: On this turn you choose to use magic against your enemy.
column4: In diesem Zug fügt Ihr Eurem Gegner magischen Schaden zu.

column2: On this turn you physically damage your enemy. Doing so changes your §G[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]§! by §G50%§!, §R[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]§! and §R[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]§! by §R-25%§!.
column4: In diesem Zug fügt Ihr dem Gegner physischen Schaden zu. Auf diese Weise erhöht Ihr Euren §G[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]!§ um §G50%§! und verringert Eure §R[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]!§ und §R[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]!§ um §R-25%!§.

column2: Cast a powerful spell to use against the enemy.
column4: Wirkt einen mächtigen Zauberspruch gegen Euren Feind.

column2: On this turn, your magic damages the enemy. Doing so changes your §G[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]§! by §G50%§!, §R[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]§! and §R[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]§! by §R-25%§!.
column4: In diesem Zug fügt Ihr Eurem Gegner magischen Schaden zu. Ihr erhöht dabei Euren §G[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]!§ um §G50%!§ und verringert Eure §R[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]!§ und §R[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]!§ um §R-25%!§.
Bringt Euch zur Auswahl der Aktionen zurück.

column2: On this turn you do NOT damage the enemy. Doing so on this turn, and the next, changes your §G[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]§! and §G[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]§! by §G50%§!, §R[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]§! and §R[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]§! by §R-50%§!.
column4: In dieser Runde fügt Ihr dem Feind keinen Schaden zu. In dieser und der nächsten Runde erhöht Ihr Eure §G[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]!§ und §G[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]!§ um §G50%!§, während §R[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]!§ und §R[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]!§ um §R-50%!§ verringert werden.

column2: On this turn you do NOT damage the enemy. Doing so on this turn, and the next, changes your §G[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]§! and §G[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]§! by §G25%§!, §R[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]§! and §R[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]§! by §R-25%§!.
column4: In dieser Runde fügt Ihr dem Feind keinen Schaden zu. Während dieser und der nächsten beiden Runden erhöht Ihr Eure §G[Root.duel_phy_def.GetName]!§ und §G[Root.duel_mag_def.GetName]!§ um §G25%!§, während Ihr Eure §R[Root.duel_phy_att.GetName]!§ und §R[Root.duel_mag_att.GetName]!§ um §R-25%!§ verringert.
\nIhr schafft es nicht, Eurem Gegner zu entkommen.

column2: You ask the enemy to part peacefully, with no blood spilled.
column4: Ihr schlagt Eurem Gegner ein Unentschieden vor, um weiteres Blutvergießen zu vermeiden.

column2: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] loses to you in battle, and the lifeless body of [target_duel_enemy.GetHersHis] lies beside you.
column4: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] verliert gegen Euch im Zweikampf, [target_duel_enemy.GetHerHis] lebloser Körper liegt nun im Sand.

column2: There must always be a Lich King…
column4: Es muss immer einen Lichkönig geben...

column2: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] lost to you in battle and you can decide the fate of [target_duel_enemy.GetHersHis].
column4: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] hat gegen Euch im Kampf verloren und nun dürft Ihr über [target_duel_enemy.GetHerHis] Schicksal entscheiden.

column2: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] gives up and asks you for mercy.
column4: [target_duel_enemy.GetFirstName] gibt auf und ersucht Euch um Gnade.

column3: Je vais épargner ta vie.
Meurs !

column2: You lost the duel, but fortunately the enemy spared your life.
column4: Ihr habt das Duell verloren, aber glücklicherweise lässt Euch Euer Gegner am Leben.

column2: You could flee in terror, but your companions would speak ill of you.
column4: Ihr seid in Panik davon gerannt, aber es machen bereits Gerüchte über Eure Feigheit die Runde.

column2: You try to escape, but fail as the enemy is quick on his feet!
column4: Ihr versucht, davonzulaufen, aber Euer Gegner ist zu schnell.

column2: The fight is over. Your opponent ran away like a coward and you can consider yourself the winner.
column4: Der Kampf ist vorbei. Euer Gegner ist davon gelaufen wie der Feigling, der er ist. Ihr habt gewonnen.

column3: Lâche !

column2: [From.GetFirstName] does not want to fight you, and asks to peacefully end this fight without any bloodshed.
column4: [From.GetFirstName] will nicht gegen Euch kämpfen und bittet darum, diese Fehde ohne Blutvergießen zu beenden.

column2: There is no reason to continue fighting.
column4: Es gibt keinen Grund mehr, weiterzukämpfen.
Nein, wir werden diese Sache hier und jetzt regeln!

column2: Oh no, we will continue to fight.

column3: La Seconde Guerre

column2: The Horde continues its march. This time, it seeks to conquer the Alliance. This war will be one of the most ambitious that has ever taken place in Azeroth, and its outcome will radically change the world as you know it.
column4: Die Horde setzt ihren Marsch fort. Dieses Mal wollen sie die ganze Allianz unterwerfen. Dieser Krieg wird einer der anspruchsvollsten sein, der jemals in Azeroth stattgefunden haben, und sein Ergebnis wird das Machtgleichgewicht in der Welt radikal verändern.

column3: Pour l'honneur, et la gloire !
Cela ne nous concerne pas.

column2: The Horde Has Won the Second War
column3: La Horde remporte la Seconde Guerre
column4: Die Horde hat den zweiten Krieg gewonnen.

column2: The Alliance won the Second War
column3: L'Alliance remporte la Seconde guerre
column4: Die Allianz hat den zweiten Krieg gewonnen.

column2: The Alliance crushed the Horde forces
column4: Die Allianz hat die Armeen der Horde vernichtet.

column3: Victoire !

column2: Several tents of varying size have gathered around a strategic point in the area, forming the heart of a young settlement.
column4: Mehrere Zelte unterschiedlicher Größe haben sich an einem strategischen Knotenpunkt in der Region angesammelt und bilden das Herzstück einer jungen Siedlung.

column2: Moats, baileys and towers have been erected to further defend the vulnerable settlement and its people. The center of the settlement becomes denser and earthwork structures begin to spring up.
column4: Wassergräben, Vorhöfe und Türme wurden errichtet, um die hilfsbedürftige Siedlung und ihre Bewohner besser zu beschützen. Das Zentrum der Siedlung wird dichter und es entstehen Erdwälle.

column2: Dominating the center of the settlement, a small nobleman's keep now dots the surrounding landscape, commanding humble respect.
column4: Der kleine Bergfried, der das Zentrum der Siedlung beherrscht, markiert heute die umgebende Landschaft und genießt bescheidenen Respekt.

column2: A sizable castle with many corridors and rooms, an intricate court of nobles and formidable stonework defenses.
column4: Eine Burg mit vielen Gängen und Räumen, einem komplizierten Adeligenhof und einer beeindruckenden steinernen Verteidigungsanlage.

column2: Expansive and strong, a keep worthy of a king stands solid and proud, able to withstand any attack. The structure itself maintains an internal ecosystem of a hundred servents, family members, and courtiers.
column4: Eine Hochburg, die eines Königs würdig ist, steht fest und stolz da und ist in der Lage, jedem Angriff standzuhalten. Die Struktur selbst unterhält ein internes Ökosystem von hunderten von Dienern, Familienmitgliedern und Höflingen.

column2: A huge sprawling complex, which can be seen from anywhere in the county, is filled with the comforts of an empire with massive war rooms and personal gardens fit for mighty rulers. The only thing that can stand to match its astounding beauty are its formidable defenses.
column4: Ein gewaltiger, ausgedehnter Komplex, der von überall in der Grafschaft aus zu sehen ist, ist voll von den Annehmlichkeiten eines Reiches mit mächtigen Kriegstrakten und persönlichen Gärten, passend für mächtige Herrscher. Das Einzige, was mit seiner erstaunlichen Schönheit mithalten kann, sind seine beeindruckenden Verteidigungsanlagen.

column2: A group of tents filled with unorganized stacks of armor racks and weapon stands, where soldiers sleep and train amongst dirty tents and storage depots.
column4: Eine Reihe von Zelten, gefüllt mit unorganisierten Stapeln von Waffen- und Rüstungsständern, zwischen denen Soldaten zwischen schmutzigen Zelten und Lagerhallen schlafen und trainieren.

column2: An enclosure within which soldiers train, sleep, and eat in a small but necessary space.
column4: Ein umzäuntes Gelände, auf dem Soldaten auf engstem Raum trainieren, schlafen und essen.

column2: A sizeable barracks where soldiers train, eat, and sleep, within a much larger space capable of housing a cellar and upper floor, giving much more space for a larger number of soldiers.
column4: Eine große Kaserne, in der Soldaten trainieren, essen und schlafen. Zusätzlich verfügt sie über einen Vorratskeller und ein Obergeschoss für die Offiziere und bietet mehr Platz für eine größere Anzahl von Soldaten.

column2: A large barracks where soldiers train, eat, and sleep along with that of their families or prisoners. This barracks is capable of holding its own personal holding cells, armory, and planning room along with rooms for trainers and officers.
column4: Eine große Baracke, in der Soldaten zusammen mit ihren Familien oder Gefangenen trainieren, essen und schlafen. Diese Kaserne bietet Platz für ihre eigenen Arrestzellen, Waffenkammern und Planungsräume, sowie Unterkünfte für Ausbilder und Offiziere.

column2: An open field where local commoners and lightly armed archers take the field to practice, which is often littered and informal.
column4: Ein offenes Feld, das von Bürgern und leicht bewaffnete Bogenschützen oft zum Trainieren genutzt wird.

column2: A large assigned area where lightly armored soldiers, levies, and archers come to practice their skills and formations.
column4: Ein großes abgegrenztes Feld, in dem leicht gepanzerte Soldaten, Lehnstruppen und Bogenschützen ihre Fähigkeiten und Formationen einüben.

column2: A lesser barracks surrounded by tents and cottages, where lesser parts of the army can find rest, food, and practice.
column4: Ein paar kleinere Quartiere, umgeben von Zelten und Hütten, in der kleinere Teile der Armee Ruhe und Verpflegung finden und trainieren können.

column2: A decently sized bastion which houses a decently sized armory used for the arming and training of commoners into a decently sized army, where local militiamen and rangers can be housed and trained.
A mount pen constructed on an open field, guarded by a fairly rickety wooden fencing and run by traditional families and estates.
A fairly large pen used for the taming and training of war mounts, with an expanded area for herding.
A series of structures dedicated to the storage and comfort of animals which are also used to help breed and train war mounts for the use of the local army.
A larger complex dedicated to the comfort and breeding of war mounts, an impressive structure comparable to that of a barracks, but for quadrupeds.
A large group of metal workers are kept on hand to create and maintain the weapons and tools of the local levy.
Series of workshops have been constructed, and the work they perform further increases the weapon and armor supply of our army.
Large portions of our keep has been constructed solely dedicated to the maintenance of our troops’ equipment including a batch of quartermasters, smithies and their apprentices.

Several halls of the keep are lined with master-crafted weapons and armor, both of the ornate and functional variety. A very large portion of our keep and the surrounding earthwork has been fitted to accomodate an enormous intake of ores and fuels so that no single soldier may be left weaponless.
The surrounding landscape is dotted with few farmhouses, estates. Not many call this land their home.
People have started to gather and build their homes under the shadow of your keep and its stone parapets while most of the population still remains outside your direct influence.
Both inside and outside the walls of your settlement lie numerous houses and forms of commercial infrastructure. The people of this land have developed a sort of economic independence.
A city which is strung up around the castle, with many shops and small apartments which house a much larger population.

Hundreds of buildings surround your keep including markets, and structures including stores, workshops. and residences alike. Most of the population is well off and prospering in the settlement that hugs your citadel.
Man sized cages are scattered across the settlement's public area, normally used fort the trapping of animals, they now serve as excellent pens for prisoners
A small and enclosed space for the keeping of livestock, both human and animal alike.
This wing of the keep is complete with cells and a torture chamber able to extract information from prisoners and rogues

This large, dark and impressive complex of cells is adorned with chains and pits. It is where multiple rooms are dedicated to the keeping of dangerous elements in the land away from the general populous.
The only roads that exist in this land are those dug out by traveling caravans and the footprints of marching armies, but they nevertheless provide a boon to the region.
Time and materials have been invested in the region's roadwork resulting in a sort of standardized brick and earthwork roads.
Stone has replaced the previous brick and earth accomodations creating a road network needing of less maintainence.
Solid stone bridges, roads, and highways connect this holding to several others, greatly increasing ease of travel for common folk and lords alike.
The roads in this area are of exceptional quality. Shrines, stalls, and other oddities find themselves besides the triving veins that are the highways of this region.
A few outlying wooden towers have been built to better defend this settlement and its people.
The towers in this area have been upgraded and fortified to better withstand attack and better pack a punch of their own.
The defense towers within and outside this holding are deeply and entrenched and solid, able to withstand any army that dares to assault.
Each tower is basically its own fortress, filled with garrison troops and topped with cutting edge defensive weaponry.
Small wooden barricades have been erected to create something that's better than no defense at all.
The palisades defending the holding have been upgraded to a sturdier stone composition.
Previous stone fortifications have been added upon and made stronger, able to withstand any skirmish or siege.
This settlement has been completely surrounded by sturdy, stone walls making this holding a poor target for any attack.
This holding is equipped with walls so exceptionally strong and fine, that they and everything they encompass are an impenetrable fortress.
A militia has been established in this settlement, ensuring defense against smaller raids and weak skirmishes.
Emergency supplies have been gathered and stored to ensure this settlement's survival in any prolonged siege.
Defensive weapons, such as oil, ballistae, traps, and catapults have been entrenched in the land surrounding the settlement, as well as upon the walls.
With the help of the keep's mages, magical traps and defenses now defend the keep, increasing the garrison's survivability.
Incredbily complex arcane wards are working together with our tradition weapons and walls creating a truly unassailable holding.
A few small docks and dockworkers have assembled along the coast to build a small naval force for this settlement.
A small shipyard and assembly line has been established, further increasing the naval force and replenishment capacity of the region.
The previous shipyard has expanded into several, practically dominating the local coast with shipmaking industry.
Industrial drydocks have been constructed finalizing increasing naval power and dominance.
A small hamlet containing few rural inhabitants has sprung up here. Buildings are scattered and generally unorganized.
Larger wooden estates and structures are being raised to create a denser population base and a somewhat organized infrastructure.
Stone housing and shops are starting to erect themselves while the landscape is slowly taken over by sprawling accomodations.
This city grows ever outward; much of the population is well off and its economy booms.
A central cosmopolitan hub of commerce, business, and common residence. Hundreds of travelers each day frequent this city and its far-reaching monuments.
Truly a city state in its own right, the bureacracy required to run a metropolis of this size is immense, but the boons it provides to its lands, lords, and the common people is equally so.
The only roads that exist in this land are those dug out by traveling caravans and the footprints of marching armies, but they nevertheless provide a boon to the region.
Time and materials have been invested in the region's roadwork resulting in a sort of standardized brick and earthwork roads.
Stone has replaced the previous brick and earth accomodations creating a road network needing of less maintainence.
Solid stone bridges, roads, and highways connect this holding to several others, greatly increasing ease of travel for common folk and lords alike.
Small wooden barricades have been erected to create something that's better than no defense at all.
The palisades defending the holding have been upgraded to a sturdier stone composition.
Previous stone fortifications have been added upon and made stronger, able to withstand any skirmish or siege.
This settlement has been completely surrounded by sturdy, stone walls making this holding a poor target for any attack.
Small guard towards surround this town protecting it from raiders and smaller armies.
A small permament garrison has been housed within the settlement better protecting it against skirmishes and raids.
The garrison in this city has become quite sizeable providing it with its own levy capable of helping support a grander army.
Several buildings have come together to form the barracks of this city. Within it, many professional soldiers train and practice so that they may one day see the field of battle.
A small dirt ground within the town has been assigned for light practice, mainly for the militia and other armed peasants.
A more walled off area has established itself within the city limits, better equipped to sustain and militia fighting force.
Several militiamen and archers practice day and night to protect the city they call home within these grounds.
Combat posts reminiscent of professional training grounds prepare this city's militiamen for the absolute worst war has to offer.
Small cottages have come together to form a small settlement of families and workers.
Some of the old cottages have seen themselves replaced with sturdier, stone housing more capable of housing a permanent population.
Large townhouses now dot the streets of this city, capable of housing multiple families, workers, and even soldiers in time of war.
Large urban estates now take up parts of the land within and outside the city limits, giving refuge to the wealthy and middle class alike.
Several shops selling food, knicknacks, and other necessities dot the roads of this town.
Some enterprises have become more successful than others, as larger buildings begin to house grander shops and merchants.
An entire plaza has been carved out of the city center, and it is meant to serve as the city's trading hub for both internal and external trade.
This section of the city has been completed dedicated to the selling of goods, necessity and luxurious, for all who can afford them.
A small private cellar within town has become the populace's primary method of any type of inebriation.
The local cellar has now moved above ground becoming a center of many nights gone awry.
This tavern not only raises the spirits of the populace, but gives several a night away in what many would call the doghouse.
Truly a house of hedonism and debauchery, many enter wanting it all, leaving with nothing left to give.
Large townhouses are specifically reserved for the nobility of this town as they stand domineering over the residences.
The nobility have claimed much of the land around their residences, further adding to their wealth and prestige.
Noble estates dominate the landscape outside the city walls painting a picture of power and richness for our city.
Large mansions have begun to dot the landscape centered in the confines of large noble estate lands. Does their wealth know no bounds?
A small-time money lender has set up shop in the town. Many see the lender as a great opportunity for commercial enterprise while some see another scam artist.
A dedicated counting house has been constructed within the city limits. The workers ensure standard weights and currencies are used in market trades.
A city this size cannot thrive without a level of central banking. Lucky enough, a bank has found great profitability right in the middle of town.
City controlled funds are minted, counted, and distributed from this golden palace of banking and lending.
Centralized grounds for general auction trading of all sorts, though the whole process is rather disorganized.
Now a permanent structure is dedicated to public trading and auctions, and as such, trading has become more frequent.
The previous auction house has become an even larger hub of free trading. More merchants from all around bring luxury and rare goods to be traded with the public of this city.
The market here has moved past tangible goods and has moved onto untangible ones such as industry names, brands, and stock ownerships in companies.
Shambling and poorly constructed tents and homes are built in the shadow of this city's walls and defenses, removed from the true citizens and those wealthy enough to live in safety.
Contributing a grand amount to the population, these slums exist both within and outside of the city creating an unsafe, yet stable, housing option for the poor.

Large houses called lodgings have been built within the city to better handle the expanding poor population. Cramped and uncomfortable, these structures bring  more off of the streets and into the recorded levy.
This city can be seen from miles away, perhaps not because of its gleaming jewels of wealth and magic that tower above it, but rather because of the large sprawl of slums hugging its walls.
Opportunities for the wealthy to educate their young now exists for those living in the city, though many unable to cope with the costs are left illiterate.
A city college has opened up to broaden the opportunities available for young and adult citizens to broaden their horizons.
This university allows the citizens of this city to further specialize their work and, in the long term, contribute to the region's enduring prosperity.

One of the many crown jewels in this municipality, acceptance into this academy is a dream for many miles around, allowing the academy to garner the reputation that any who attend it are gauranteed a future.
Though the boats born from these humble docks are for commercial or gathering use, some larger galleys are found to be leviable by the city.
A small dedicated shipyard has now been built to focus solely on the product of sea faring warships.
Several shipyard now line the coastline, all united in a common goal so that the fruits of their labor may rule the waves.
An independent shipbuilding enterprise has taken over the city's shipyards, improving upon previous processes and creating a warship manufactory sure to draw the envy of any naval power.
A small wharf consisting of a few piers has been constructed here bringing in more fish than actual commercial income.
These piers have become more dedicated over time to accommodate merchant housing and stalls, increasing the commercial capabilities of these docks.
These docks have expanded greatly to house several merchants and shipping company quarters as well as the numerous ships of both parties.
Bustling is an understatement when one looks upon the impressive merchant navies that frequent this seaport and the goods that come from far away lands birthed from their commercial enterprise.
A building in the center of the city has been erected to help give safe space for those in charge of the town. Many important decisions are made here daily.
City officials are now elected as council members, and these council people meet in these chambers to discuss the matters of the city and its people.
The council chambers have been upgraded to include other public amenities such as law enforcement agencies, a small city library, and a wing for lawmakers.
As the city grows, the processes that support it must grow as well. This has been exemplified through the stone centerpiece of this city that is the city hall.
A bastion of bureacracy garrisoning an army of lawmakers and bureacratic workers, this building is the beating heart of the city controlling everything through and from complex laws and taxes.
The land in this region has been deemed holy ground, leading practitioners from the area to converge here and find community in common beliefs.
A small physical structure has taken root upon this hallowed ground, giving space to its practitioners and their respective communities.
The communities here have become semi-autonomous, creating a sanctuary for those tired of the life outside of them and their practices.

Leaders have been chosen by local congregations forming a church-like hierarchy of power. This has been officialized in the construction of a new house of belief and practice that stands out in the region.
The temple here has become a beacon for its practitioners pulling believers from all around the region to worship here with countless others.
This place of faith has become a true holy site for those who trust and believe in the local faith, creating an incorruptible citadel of belief.
A small school that teaches its students, some rather talented, basic magic spells including firebolt and arcane missles.
This college is filled with dedicated sorcerers and mages continuing their training as they master portalcrafting and inscription.
An academy dominates the block, and the sheer amount of students it has under its tutelage is beginning to alter the ley fields in the area.
Several academy buildings form nothing short of a city-wide campus and master mages graduate from its ranks having mastered destructive magics.
The temple in this area has been garrisoned by a small troupe of troops dedicated to this holy place's defense.
A larger part of the temple has been dedicated to the stationing of troops and maintaining a constant guard.
The guards of this temple have expanded their influence and established guard stations further out from the temple able to detect attacks before they occur.
Large barracks now stand outside the temple grounds and house a large contingent of soldiers dedicated to the faith.
Fine, tempered stained glass has been installed in the fixtures of this temple.
column4: In den Einbauten dieses Tempels wurde feines, gehärtetes Buntglas installiert.

column3: Enclave druidique

column2: A small reclusive clearing within the woods where young druids can commune with the spirits of the forest and ask for boons and assistance.
column4: Eine kleine abgelegene Lichtung, auf der junge Druiden mit den Geistern des Waldes kommunizieren und um Gaben und Hilfe bitten können.

column2: A druidic enclave within the forest, complete with multiple ancients and other forest spirits making the area their home.
column4: Eine druidische Enklave im Wald, komplett mit mehreren Uralten und anderen Waldgeistern, die das Gebiet zu ihrer Heimat machen.

column3: Le Puits de soleil

column2: A sacred fount of untold power, the Sunwell saturates every fiber of the the High Elves. It was created from a vial containing a sample of water from the Well of Eternity, and it lies at the convergence of power leylines buried below Quel'Thalas. This holy well also maintains the enchantments keeping the Eversong Woods in a period of eternal springtime.
column4: Als heilige Quelle ungeahnter Kraft füllt der Sonnenbrunnen jede Faser der Hochelfen mit purer Magie. Er wurde mit einer Phiole mit Wasser aus dem Brunnen der Ewigkeit geschaffen und liegt an der Konvergenz der unter Quel'Thalas begrabenen Leylinien. Dieser heilige Brunnen bewahrt auch die Verzauberungen, die den Eversong Wald in einen ewigen Frühlings versetzen.

column3: Le Puits de la Mort

column2: The Sunwell, once a sacred beacon of High Elven culture, has fallen to the corruption of the Lich King's undeath after being used to resurrect the fallen necromancer, Kel'Thuzad.
column4: Der Sonnenbrunnen, einst ein heiliges Leuchtfeuer der hochelfischen Kultur, ist der Verderbnis der Untoten des Lichkönigs zum Opfer gefallen, nachdem er zur Wiederbelebung des gefallenen Totenbeschwörers Kel'Thuzad benutzt wurde.

column3: Le Puits du Vide

column2: The Sunwell, once a sacred beacon of High Elven culture, has fallen to the corruption of the Void. What was once a beacon of Arcane and Light is now a hollow void drawing dark entities to Azeroth with nearly limitless power.
column4: Der Sonnenbrunnen, einst ein heiliges Leuchtfeuer der hochelfischen Kultur, ist der Korruption durch die Leere zum Opfer gefallen. Was einst eine Quelle des Arkanen und des Lichts war, ist heute ein Leerenspalt, der dunkle Wesen mit nahezu grenzenloser Macht nach Azeroth zieht.

column3: Le Puits démoniaque

column2: The Sunwell, once a sacred beacon of High Elven culture, has fallen to the corruption of Fel. What was once a beacon of Arcane and Light is now a profane Fel portal, summoning hundreds of demons to Azeroth, as well as fueling their war machine.
column4: Der Sonnenbrunnen, einst ein heiliges Leuchtfeuer der hochelfischen Kultur, ist der Korruption des Fel zum Opfer gefallen. Was einst eine Quelle des Arkanen und des Lichts war, ist heute ein gewaltiges Felportal, das Hunderte von Dämonen nach Azeroth ruft und ihre Legion antreibt.

column3: Le Puits de soleil restauré

column2: The Sunwell was formerly the heart of Quel'dorei civilization, after being lost to dark powers the Sunwell has been reborn with the Light. No longer merely a fount of Arcane, it is now a fount of the Holy Light, it's essence filling the thalassian elves with the Light on a constant basis.
column4: Der Sonnenbrunnen war einst das Herz der Quel'dorei-Zivilisation, nachdem er durch dunkle Kräfte verloren gegangen war, wurde er mit der Kraft des Lichts erneuert. Nicht mehr nur eine Quelle des Arkanen, sondern durchflutet von der Macht des heiligen Lichts, durchflutet seine Essenz die thalassischen Elfen ständig mit Licht.

column3: Nordrassil corrompu

column2: The World Tree Nordrassil has been defiled and corrupted with Fel by the Legion. What was once a beacon of life is now a mockery, designed to further the Legion's cause to exterminate all life on this world. Drawing upon the corrupted waters beneath it's roots, the tree is fueling hundreds of demons, further adding to the nearly unstoppable power of the Burning Legion.
column4: Der Weltenbaum Nordrassil wurde von der Legion geschändet und mit Fel korrumpiert. Was einst ein Leuchtfeuer des Lebens war, ist heute eine Verhöhnung, die der Sache der Legion dienen soll, alles Leben auf dieser Welt zu vernichten. Gespeist vom verseuchten Wasser unter seinen Wurzeln treibt der Baum Hunderte Dämonen an und verstärkt die fast unaufhaltsame Macht der Brennenden Legion.

column3: Victoire !
Démoniste en secret

column2: This character is a warlock, but hides it.
column3: Ce personnage est un démoniste, mais le cache.
column4: Dieser Charakter ist in Wahrheit ein Hexenmeister, hält sich aber bedeckt.

column3: Nécromancien en secret

column2: This character is a necromancer, but hides it.
column3: Ce personnage est un nécromancien, mais le cache.
column4: Dieser Charakter ist in Wahrheit ein Totenbeschwörer, hält sich aber bedeckt.

column2: Hakkar is inexorable. He needs fresh blood, new sacrifices... The blood of mortals, who dared to stand in your way, will again pour on the steps of the altars. Praise the Soulflayer! Praise Hakkar!
column4: Hakkar ist unerbittlich. Er braucht frisches Blut, neue Opfer... Das Blut der Sterblichen, die es wagten, sich Euch in den Weg zu stellen, wird wieder auf die Stufen der Altäre fließen. Gelobt sei der Seelenschinder! Gelobt sei Hakkar!

column2: As soon as your captors pulled the bag off your head, you saw a sacrificial pit with dozens of mutilated corpses. After a moment, you felt your blood spatter from your severed neck. Your sight began to darken and soon your lifeless body fell into the pit with the rest of the sacrificed.
column4: Sobald Eure Entführer den Sack von Eurem Kopf zogen, saht Ihr eine Opfergrube mit Dutzenden von verstümmelten Leichen. Einen Moment später spürtet Ihr, wie Euer Blut von Eurem abgetrennten Hals spritzte. Euer Blick begann sich zu verdunkeln, und bald fiel Euer lebloser Körper in die Grube, zusammen mit dem Rest der Geopferten.

column2: You have proven that you are able to shed the blood of your enemies in the name of Hakkar. But what about your own blood? Are you ready to sacrifice it to the Soulflayer and show yourself as his faithful follower?
column4: Ihr habt bewiesen, dass ihr in der Lage seid, im Namen von Hakkar das Blut eurer Feinde zu vergießen. Aber was ist mit Eurem eigenen Blut? Seid Ihr bereit, es dem Seelenschinder zu opfern und Euch als seinen treuen Anhänger zu zeigen?

column3: Oui !

column2: The blood rituals came to an end. Only the sacrificial pits filled with rotting corpses, and the dried black blood on the steps of the altars testifies to the horrors that occurred in your possession. The Soulflayer is pleased with you.
column4: Die Blutrituale sind zu Ende gegangen. Nur die mit verrottenden Leichen gefüllten Opfergruben und das getrocknete schwarze Blut auf den Stufen der Altäre zeugen von den Schrecken, die in Eurem Land geschehen sind. Der Seelenschinder ist zufrieden mit Euch.

column2: When you were left alone, you came to the table. From the very morning, the lord's whisper disturbed your mind, and now the hour of the offering has come. From the sight of the stars, shimmering in the abyss, the witnesses to your crime, a fire of a candle has shuddered and shadows, produced by the light, become running around. Any mortal will be sacrificed, any desire of god will be fulfilled... All for his blessing!
column4: Als Ihr allein wart, gingt Ihr an den Tisch. Seit dem frühen Morgen war das Flüstern des Meisters in Eurem Verstand zu vernehmen und nun ist die Stunde der Opferung gekommen. Die Schatten, die von den Sternen, die in der Leere schimmern, den Zeugen Eures Verbrechens, und dem Licht einer Kerze erzeugt wurden, zitterten bei jeder Eurer Bewegungen. Jeder Sterbliche wird geopfert, jeder Wunsch Gottes wird erfüllt... Alles für seinen Segen!

column2: My Lord, take my blood and flesh!
column4: Mein Meister, nehmt mein eigen Fleisch und Blut!

column2: Dust chocked the eyes and throat, a swarm of small bugs crawls under the skin, a hot wind hits the face, the howl of drums tears my ears. The black scarab rolled the sun beyond the horizon and... the peace came. The sound of the dripping water, the flicker of His purple eye and the whisper: "I am pleased..." Yes, it happened! The Lord has paid his attention to you!
column4: Staub hat die Augen und den Hals verstopft, ein Schwarm kleiner Käfer krabbelte unter der Haut, ein heißer Wind bläst in das Gesicht, das Heulen der Trommeln zerreißt die Ohren. Der schwarze Skarabäus schob die Sonne hinter den Horizont und... Frieden kam. Das Geräusch von tropfendem Wasser, der Schimmer seines purpurnen Auges und das Flüstern: „Ich bin erfreut...“ Ja, es ist passiert! Der Meister hat Euch beachtet!

column2: Cold has bound the body with chains like iron. Before the eyes the stars rushed past, falling one after another into a gigantic abyss. It stinks of rot from it. The feeling of despair wins and you fall towards the toothy mouth. Scary laughter fills the space, but the flight can not be stopped. Yes, it happened! The Lord has paid his attention to you!
column4: Die Kälte hielt den Körper eisernen Ketten gleich umschlungen. Vor den Augen rasten die Sterne vorbei, einer nach dem anderen fiel in einen gewaltigen Abgrund, aus dem es nach Fäulnis stank. Die Verzweiflung nahm Überhand und Ihr fielt auf das zahnbewehrte Maul zu. Schreckliches Gelächter erfüllte den Raum, aber Ihr konntet Euren Fall nicht stoppen. Ja, es ist passiert! Der Meister hat Euch beachtet!

column2: The heart beats faster and faster. You hear the crunch of breaking bones, it's you who clenched your fists so much. The pulse grows with every second. A veil of the color of black blood covers the eyes... But then the anger sharply disappears and is replaced by awareness: it's not your heart that pulsates. It's His... Yes, it happened! The Lord has paid his attention to you!
column4: Das Herz schlägt stärker und stärker. Ihr hört das Knacken zerbrechender Knochen, Eurer Knochen, weil Ihr die Fäuste so fest geballt habt. Der Herzschlag nimmt mit jeder Sekunde zu. Ein Schleier schwarzen Blutes verhüllt Euren Blick... Doch dann verschwindet der Ärger abrupt und wird durch Erkenntnis ersetzt: Nicht Euer Herz pulsiert. Dies ist Sein Herz... Ja, es ist passiert! Der Meister hat Euch beachtet!

column2: Water presses from all sides. A futile attempt to escape loses all meaning as soon as the tentacles compromise your body. You watch how the last rays of the sun disappear into the abyss. And then you lower your head and see... the dark rays of a new dawn. The deep dawn... Yes, it happened! The Lord has paid his attention to you!
column4: Von allen Seiten strömt Wasser auf Euch zu. In dem Moment, als Tentakel Euren Körper umfangen, ist jeglicher Fluchtversuch vergeblich. Ihr bemerkt noch, wie die letzten Sonnenstrahlen in der Dunkelheit verschwinden, dann senkt Ihr den Blick und entdeckt... die dunklen Strahlen eines neuen Zwielichts. Zwielicht... Ja, es ist passiert! Der Meister hat Euch beachtet!

column2: My Lord, let me bring the greatness of Ny'alotha!
column4: Meister, lasst mich die Größe Ny'alothas verbreiten!

column2: My Lord, share with me great knowledge!
column4: Meister, teilt mit mir Euer großes Wissen!

column2: My Lord, grant me countless legions!
My Lord, give me the tongue sharper than any sword!
column4: Meister, gib mir eine Zunge, die schärfer ist als jedes Schwert!

column2: The great festival of Noblegarden has long been celebrated by humans, and more recently by the other races of the Alliance. During this joyous event, it is customary for the nobles and lords from each race to hide coins, candy, and the occasional treasures within special eggs painted to look like wildflowers. These eggs are then scattered around major cities for the citizenry to find.

Every year, the druids of Moonglade hold a celebration of their city's great triumph over an ancient evil. During the Lunar Festival, citizens of Azeroth have the opportunity to honour their elders by celebrating their sage wisdom, sharing in magnificent feasts, and of course by shooting fireworks!

Love may be in the air, but be cautious, as the season's spreading joy seems to have nefarious undertones. Recently, a strange ''love sickness'' has clouded the hearts of many of Azeroth's people - is this widespread incident simply an outbreak of romance, or will you and your fellow brave adventurers uncover a dark secret behind this plague of passion?
Take an orphan under your wing, perform the tasks you are presented with, and you'll show one of Azeroth's children that you care!

Across Azeroth and Outland, brilliant bonfires have been lit to rekindle people's spirits and ward off ancient evils. Each year, new guardians are chosen to watch over the sacred flames and ensure that they are never extinguished. Called ''flamekeepers,'' these chosen few request the aid of brave adventurers to traverse the land and journey into the dark recesses of Azeroth's dungeons. It is rumoured that any heroes who are willing to brave the terrors placed before them will be rewarded for their efforts through the power of the flames.

The Harvest Festival is a time to commemorate those who have sacrificed their lives to help their allies. Throughout history, many have given their lives to that end. Every year, members of the Horde and the Alliance set aside time to honour the memories of the fallen and to pay tribute to those whose memories are held most dear: Uther Lightbringer for the Alliance, and Grommash Hellscream for the Horde.

Celebrated by both the Horde and the Alliance, Brewfest is a time to enjoy the fermented fruits of the harvest: pretzels, cheese, and booze! The competing breweries of Thunderbrew, Barleybrew, and the ogre brewers all come together outside of the major cities in a bid to outdo each other with their special ales, meads, and beers. Brave adventurers are invited to sit back, take a break, and sample the finest wares these brewers have to offer!

Observed by both the Horde and the Alliance, Hallow's End is a celebration of the break between the Forsaken and the Scourge. Many tricks and treats await adventurers seeking holiday fun, including defeating the Headless Horseman, visiting inns and cities for fun items such as masks and costumes, and eating way too much candy in one sitting.

It's a time to reflect on your journeys and good fortune by sharing plentiful food and stories with friends. You can partake in wonderful Pilgrim's Bounty feasts near major towns by sitting at a bountiful table and enjoying the foods you find.

The Festival of Winter Veil is one of the most anticipated events of the year! While enjoying a freshly nutmegged cup of nog and crunching on a crumbly cookie or two, be sure to visit Greatfather Winter in Ironforge if you're a member of the Alliance, or Greatfather Winter in Orgrimmar if you're part of the Horde. While there, you'll find a few treats and a few tasks to take on as well.
There has not been such a feast within the last two years.
column4: Ein solches Fest hat in den letzten 2 Jahren nicht stattgefunden.

column2: You're busy looking for eggs and come across a child who is also seeking for eggs.
column3: Vous êtes occupé à chercher des œufs et rencontrez un enfant attelé à la même tâche.
column4: Ihr seid auf der Suche nach Eiern und stoßt auf ein Kind, das auch Eier sucht.

column3: Vous pouvez les avoir.
Ils sont à moi !

column2: The celebration of Noblegarden draws to an end.
column3: La fête du Jardin des Nobles touche à sa fin.
column4: Die Feierlichkeiten von Noblegarden neigen sich dem Ende zu.

column3: Jusqu'à l'année prochaine!

column2: The celebration of Noblegarden has begun on Azeroth! You should go and collect some eggs in order to celebrate it with everyone!
column3: La fête du Jardin des Nobles a commencé partout sur Azeroth ! Préparez vous à des chasses aux œufs effrenées pour célébrer avec tout le monde !
column4: Die Feierlichkeiten von Noblegarden beginnen in ganz Azeroth! Ihr solltet gehen und ein paar Eier sammeln, um mit allen zu feiern!

column2: I am no longer a child.
column3: Je ne suis plus un enfant.
Des œufs, enfin !

column2: The celebration lacks the funds to continue, but the party-goers will not accept this. They demand the celebration be funded with cash taken from your own treasury!
column3: La fête manque de fonds pour continuer, mais les fêtards n'accepteront pas cela. Ils exigent que la célébration soit financée avec de l'argent provenant de votre propre trésorerie!
column4: Die Feierlichkeiten litten unter dem Mangel an Geldmitteln und empörte Gäste kamen, um zu verlangen, dass die Feier trotzdem abgehalten wird. Mit Mitteln aus Euren eigenen Taschen!

column2: We must give in to their demands...
column3: Nous devons céder à leurs demandes...

column2: They will get nothing from me!
column3: Ils n'auront rien de moi!
column4: Von mir werden sie nichts bekommen!

column2: The holidays have arrived, and it is now time to collect eggs with the children!
column3: Les vacances sont arrivées et le moment est venu de trouver des œufs avec les enfants!
column4: Die Ferien sind da und es wird Zeit, mit den Kindern Eier suchen zu gehen.

column3: Envoie ton enfant seul.

column2: Send one of your vassals or courtiers.
column3: Envoyez l'un de vos vassaux ou courtisans.
column4: Schickt einen Eurer Vasallen oder Höflinge mit.

column3: Une excellente suggestion.

column2: Farmers prohibit you from collecting any eggs.
column3: Les agriculteurs vous empêchent de récolter des œufs.
column4: Bauern halten Euch davon ab, Eier zu suchen.

column3: Nous devons faire face à cela.
Envoyez-les loin.

column2: You are busy collecting eggs, until you are attacked by a group of rabbits!
column3: Vous êtes en train de collecter des œufs jusqu'à ce que vous soyez attaqués par un groupe de lapins!
column4: Ihr seid damit beschäftigt Eier zu suchen - als Ihr plötzlich von einer Gruppe Hasen angegriffen werdet.

column3: Tenter une évasion.
Affrontez-les !

column2: You found several chocolate eggs - but what will you do with them?
column3: Vous avez trouvé plusieurs œufs en chocolat, mais qu'en ferez vous ?
column4: Ihr fandet etliche Schokoladeneier - aber was fangt Ihr nun mit ihnen an?

column3: Mangez-les.
Les laisser pour plus tard.

column2: The blood rituals came to an end. Only the sacrificial pits filled with rotting corpses, and the dried black blood on the steps of the altars testifies to the horrors that occurred in your possession. The Soulflayer is pleased with you.
column4: Die Blutrituale sind zu Ende gegangen. Nur die mit verrottenden Leichen gefüllten Opfergruben und das getrocknete schwarze Blut auf den Stufen der Altäre zeugen von den Schrecken, die in Eurem Land geschehen sind. Der Seelenschinder ist zufrieden mit Euch.
